flavor: "I do not need to defend my decisions."
name: Magneto
text: Magnetic Pull — Action: Discard cards from the top of your deck until a [[Magnetic]] card is discarded → add that card to your hand. (Limit once per round.)

flavor: "All that I've endured, and everything I've done, it was all to preserve mutantkind."
name: Erik Lehnsherr
text: Survivor — Response: After you change to this form, shuffle the top 3 cards of your discard pile into your deck.

flavor: "It took considerable effort to rebuild my home. Let's not destroy it again." —Magneto
name: Asteroid M
text: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Asteroid M → shuffle the topmost [[Magnetic]] card in your discard pile into your deck and heal 1 damage from your identity.

flavor: Magneto's helmet protects him from telepathic attacks.
name: Magneto's Helmet
text: Magneto gains steady. Resource: Exhaust Magneto's Helmet → generate a [wild] resource for a [[Magnetic]] card.

name: Magneto's Armor
text: Response: After you resolve your "Magnetic Pull" ability, if you discarded at least 1 of the following resource icons: [mental] — Magneto gets +1 THW this round. [physical] — Magneto gets +1 ATK this round. [energy] — Magneto gets +1 DEF this round.

name: Magneto's Cape
text: Magneto gains the [[Aerial]] trait. Response: After you resolve your "Magnetic Pull" ability, exhaust Magneto's Cape → ready Magneto.

name: Magnetic Bubble
text: Magneto gains retaliate 1. Forced Interrupt: When you would take any amount of damage, place it here. Then, if there is at least 6 damage here, discard Magnetic Bubble.

flavor: "Your power is no match for the Master of Magnetism!"—Magneto
name: Wrapped in Metal
text:
Hero form only. Attach to a non-[[ELITE]] minion.
Attached minion cannot activate. Treat its printed text box as if it were blank.

name: Electromagnetic Blast
text: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 3 threat from a scheme. If this removes the last threat from that scheme, you may discard an attachment with the text "Hero Action" or "Hero Response."

flavor: "The way to defend mutants is to defeat our enemies." —Magneto
name: Metal Shards
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 7 damage to an enemy. If this attack defeats that enemy, gain a tough status card.

flavor: "I have heard your threats, and here is my reply."—Magneto
name: Magnetic Missile
text: Hero Action: Discard a minion with Wrapped in Metal attached → deal 5 damage to an enemy and stun it.

flavor: Magneto's power renders conventional firearms useless against him.
name: Master of Magnetism

flavor: "I don't mind being a bull in a china shop."
name: M
text: Response: After M enters play, defeat a minion with fewer remaining hit points than M.

name: Kid Omega
text: Response: After Kid Omega enters play, choose: • Spend a [energy] resource → deal 1 damage to each enemy. • Spend a [mental] resource → remove 1 threat from each scheme.

flavor: "Joining the X-Men means joining a family. It means you're never truly alone."
name: Phoenix
text: Response: After Phoenix enters play, choose an [[X-Men]] ally → ready that ally and heal 1 damage from it.

name: Cyclops
text: Response: After Cyclops enters play, choose an enemy. Until the end of the phase, increase the amount of damage that enemy takes from each attack by 1.

name: Won't Stay Down
text: Play only if your identity has the [[X-Force]] or [[X-Men]] trait. Max 1 per player. Alter-Ego Action: Discard this card → return an [[X-Force]] or [[X-Men]] ally from your discard pile to your hand.

name: Squared Off
text: Hero Action: Discard cards from the encounter deck until you discard a minion. Put that minion into play engaged with you → play an ally from your hand, reducing its cost by 3.

name: Noble Sacrifice
text: Hero Action: Discard an ally you control → heal damage from your hero equal to that ally's printed hit points and give your hero a tough status card.

name: "You Got This!"
text: Hero Response: After you exhaust your hero to make a basic thwart or attack, discard an ally you control → add that ally's matching power to your hero's power for this use. Ready your hero.

flavor: The dream of every student at Xavier's school is to join the X-Men.
name: New Recruits
text: Victory 0. Play only if your identity has the [[X-Men]] trait. When Defeated: Each player chooses 1 set-aside [[New]] ally and adds it to their hand.

flavor: "Oh darling, I hardly need psionic powers to manipulate you."
name: White Queen
text: Play only if your identity has the [[X-Force]] or [[X-Men]] trait. Response: After White Queen enters play, discard a status card from a character.

name: Face the Past
text: Max 1 per deck. Hero Action: Search the encounter deck, discard pile, and set-aside area for your nemesis minion and reveal it → ready your hero and draw 3 cards. You cannot attack the villain this phase. Remove this card from the game.

flavor: "Touch my friends and you get 10,000 volts!"
name: Surge
text:
Linked (New Recruits).
If you have the [[Mutant]] or [[X-Men]] trait, Surge gets +1 ATK and does not count against your ally limit.

flavor: "It's hard to be a kid when you look like a monster."
name: Anole
text:
Linked (New Recruits).
If you have the [[Mutant]] or [[X-Men]] trait, Anole gets +1 THW and does not count against your ally limit.

name: Bling!
text:
Linked (New Recruits).
If you have the [[Mutant]] or [[X-Men]] trait, Bling! gains toughness and does not count against your ally limit.

flavor: "I have seen atrocities done to mutants. No more!"
name: Indra
text:
Linked (New Recruits).
If you have the [[Mutant]] or [[X-Men]] trait, Indra gets +2 hit points and does not count against your ally limit.

name: Children of the Atom
text:
Play under any player's control. Max 1 per player.
Each [[X-Factor]], [[X-Force]], and [[X-Men]] character you control gains the [[X-Factor]], [[X-Force]], and [[X-Men]] traits.
